definitions.definition: A large village and civil parish in eastern Shropshire , England , formerly in the old Bridgnorth district ( OS grid ref SJ8104 ) .
A small village in Pimhill parish, north of Shrewsbury , Shropshire (the parish is better known as Bomere Heath and District) ( OS grid ref SJ4918 ) .

main_definition: A large village and civil parish in eastern Shropshire , England , formerly in the old Bridgnorth district ( OS grid ref SJ8104 ) .
secondary_definitions: A small village in Pimhill parish, north of Shrewsbury , Shropshire (the parish is better known as Bomere Heath and District) ( OS grid ref SJ4918 ) .
